name: Immortal Heart
summary: A town bustles with news of a young woman’s abduction. Having lost your younger brother two years previous and sensing a connection, you begin to search for leads. You find yourself at the doorstep of a man named Vis, who has been said to have information on anything that you could ever want to know. Vis agrees to tell you about your missing brother, but only for a price… that is impossible for you to pay. Vis extends to you an offer: “Take this luggage and get on the train that I tell you to.”
